original: tathārūpāmahaṃ duṣkaracaryāṃ careyaṃ yathā na pūrvaṃ kenacit sattvasaṃkhyātena anyatīrthikena vā śrāvakayānikena vā pratyekabuddhayānikena vā anuttaramahāyānikena vā evaṃ duṣkaracaryācīrṇapūrvaḥ syāt;
analyzed: tathārūpām aham duṣkara caryām careyam yathā na pūrvam kenacid sattva saṃkhyātena anya tīrthikena vā śrāvaka yānikena vā pratyekabuddha yānikena vā anuttara mahā yānikena vā evam duṣkara caryā cīrṇa pūrvaḥ syāt

original: na ca punaḥ paścāt kaścit sattvasaṃkhyātaścaret anyatīrthikā vā evaṃrūpāṃ duṣkaracārikāṃ śaktāṃścarantu yathāhaṃ careyaṃ |
analyzed: na ca punar paścāt kaścid sattva saṃkhyātaḥ caret anya tīrthikāḥ vā evaṃrūpām duṣkara cārikām śaktān carantu yathā aham careyam

original: aprāptāyāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tadāhaṃ puruṣakāraṃ kuryāṃ sabalakāyaṃ māraṃ parājayeyaṃ,
analyzed: aprāptāyām anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau tadā aham puruṣakāram kuryām sa balakāyam māram parājayeyam
sa avaśeṣa karma phalam ca adhiṣṭhiheyam
kleśa māram jineyam
anuttarām ca samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyam
tat aham eka sattvasya santāneḥ ha tvam pratiṣṭhāpayeyam

original: tathā dvitīyasya tathā tṛtīyasya tathā caturthasya dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
analyzed: tathā dvitīyasya tathā tṛtīyasya tathā caturthasya dharmam deśayeyam
santāne ca arha tvam pratiṣṭhāpayeyam
ekaikasya sattvasya artham aham śata sahasraśas prātihāryāṇi darśayeyam
tasya ca santāne samyak dṛṣṭim pratiṣṭhāpayeyam
bahuni ca dharma artha vyañjana sahasrāṇi bhāṣayeyam
yathā śaktyā ca phale pratiṣṭhāpayeyam

original: vajramayāṃśca sattvānāṃ santāne kleśaparvatāṃ jñānavajreṇa bhindyāṃ triyānena vyavasthānena dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ |
analyzed: vajra mayān ca sattvānām santāne kleśa parvatām jñāna vajreṇa bhindyām triyānena vyavasthānena dharmam deśayeyam

original: ekasattvasyārthāyāhaṃ bahuyojanaśatāni padbhyāṃ gaccheyaṃ dharmadeśanārthamabhayapade pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ |
analyzed: eka sattvasya arthāya aham bahu yojana śatāni padbhyām gaccheyam dharma deśanā artham abhaya pade pratiṣṭhāpanā artham
apratiṣedhaḥ ca me śāsane bhavet pravrajyāyāḥ

original: durbalasya muṣṭasmṛteḥ vibhrāntacittasya mukharapragalbhacittasya praduṣṭacittasya duḥprajñacittasya bahukleśākulacittasya mātṛgrāmasya mama śāsane pravrajyopasaṃpadbhavet |
analyzed: durbalasya muṣṭa smṛteḥ vibhrānta cittasya mukhara pragalbha cittasya praduṣṭa cittasya duḥprajña cittasya bahu kleśa ākula cittasya mātṛgrāmasya mama śāsane pravrajyā upasaṃpad bhavet
catasraḥ ca me parṣāḥ syuḥ bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī upāsaka upasikāḥ

original: bahujanaprabhūtaṃ me śāsanaṃ bhavet devānāṃ satyadarśanaṃ yakṣāṇāṃ nāgānāmasurāṇāmāryāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgata upoṣadhavāsaḥ,
analyzed: bahu jana prabhūtam me śāsanam bhavet devānām satya darśanam yakṣāṇām nāgānām asurāṇām ārya aṣṭāṅga samanvāgataḥ upoṣadha vāsaḥ
yāvat tiryagyoni gatānām api brahmacarya āvāsaḥ bhavet

original: bodhiprāptasya ca me bhadanta bhagavan ye sattvā mama praduṣṭacittā vadhakacittāḥ śastreṇa vāgninā vā śaktyā va vividhena vā praharaṇenopasaṃkrāmeyuḥ,
analyzed: bodhi prāptasya ca me bhadanta bhagavan ye sattvāḥ mama praduṣṭa cittāḥ vadhaka cittāḥ śastreṇa vā agninā vā śaktyā vā vividhena vā praharaṇena upasaṃkrāmeyuḥ
rukṣaiḥ paruṣaiḥ vacanaiḥ ākrośeyuḥ paribhāṣeyuḥ diś vidikṣu vāyaśaḥśabdam cāreyuḥ
viṣa saṃsṛṣṭam vā āhāra pānam upanāmayeyuḥ
evaṃrūpām karma phalān a parikṣīṇān adhiṣṭhihitvā anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyam

original: yathā bodhiprāptasya me sattvāḥ pūrvaṃ vaireṇa vadhakopakaraṇaprayogena paruṣavacanavividhapraharaṇaviṣānnapānasaṃsṛṣṭenopasaṃkrāmeyuḥ rudhiraṃ ca me utpādayeyuḥ,
analyzed: yathā bodhi prāptasya me sattvāḥ pūrvam vaireṇa vadhaka upakaraṇa prayogena paruṣa vacana vividha praharaṇa viṣa anna pāna saṃsṛṣṭena upasaṃkrāmeyuḥ rudhiram ca me utpādayeyuḥ

original: teṣāṃ sattvānāmahaṃ śīlaśrutasamādhimahākaruṇābhāvitena brahmasvaraghoṣadundubhinarditena svareṇa tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
analyzed: teṣām sattvānām aham śīla śruta samādhi mahā karuṇā bhāvitena brahma svara ghoṣa dundubhi narditena svareṇa tathārūpam dharmam deśayeyam

original: yatteṣāṃ cittāni prasādayeyaṃ kuśale ca niyojayeyaṃ;
analyzed: yat teṣām cittāni prasādayeyam kuśale ca niyojayeyam
yathā te sattvāḥ karma āvaraṇam deśayeyuḥ
āpatyām saṃvaram āpadyeyuḥ

original: na ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ svarge mokṣaphale vairāgye āśravakṣaye vā āvaraṇakarma bhaved iti,
analyzed: na ca teṣām sattvānām svarge mokṣa phale vairāgye āśrava kṣaye vā āvaraṇa karma bhavet iti
mama ca atra aparikṣīṇa karma phala kṣīṇa vyantīkṛtam bhavet

original: bodhiprāptasya ca me bhadanta bhagavan yāvanto mama romakūpā bhaveyustāvanto divasaṃ buddhavigrahānnirmiṇuyāṃ dvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtānaśītibhiranuvyañjanaistāṃścāhaṃ buddhavigrahān śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu preṣayeyaṃ,
analyzed: bodhi prāptasya ca me bhadanta bhagavan yāvantaḥ mama romakūpāḥ bhaveyuḥ tāvantaḥ divasam buddha vigrahān nirmiṇuyām dvātriṃśadbhiḥ mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtān aśītibhiḥ anuvyañjanaiḥ tān ca aham buddha vigrahān śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu preṣayeyam
a śūnyeṣu ca preṣayeyam
pañca kaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu preṣayeyam

original: ye cāpi teṣu buddhakṣetreṣvānantaryakārakāḥ sattvā bhaveyuḥ saddharmapratikṣepakāḥ āryāpavādakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānakāḥ,
analyzed: ye ca api teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ānantarya kārakāḥ sattvāḥ bhaveyuḥ saddharma pratikṣepakāḥ ārya apavādakāḥ yāvat akuśala mūla samavadhānakāḥ

original: ye'pi tatra sattvāḥ śrāvakayānasaṃprasthitāḥ pratyekabuddhayānasaṃprasthitā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ śikṣāyāṃ kalmāṣakāriṇaḥ chidracāriṇaḥ mūlāpattimāpannāḥ dagdhasantānāḥ śubhamārgapraṇaṣṭāḥ saṃsārāṭavīsaṃprasthitāḥ kumārgavihanyamānā mahāsaṅkaṭaprāptāḥ,
analyzed: ye api tatra sattvāḥ śrāvaka yāna saṃprasthitāḥ pratyekabuddha yāna saṃprasthitāḥ mahāyāna saṃprasthitāḥ śikṣāyām kalmāṣa kāriṇaḥ chidra cāriṇaḥ mūla āpattim āpannāḥ dagdha santānāḥ śubha mārga praṇaṣṭāḥ saṃsāra aṭavī saṃprasthitāḥ ku mārga vihanyamānāḥ mahā saṅkaṭa prāptāḥ

original: tathārūpāḥ sattvāḥ sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrādeko buddhavigraha ekadivase sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayet |
analyzed: tathārūpāḥ sattvāḥ sattva koṭī nayuta śata sahasrāt ekaḥ buddha vigrahaḥ eka divase sattvānām dharmam deśayet

original: ye sattvā maheśvarabhaktikāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ maheśvararūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ |
analyzed: ye sattvāḥ maheśvara bhaktikāḥ teṣām sattvānām maheśvara rūpeṇa dharmam deśayeyam

original: sahe ca buddhakṣetre mama varṇaṃ bhāṣayeyustatra ca sattvānāṃ praṇidhānamudyojayeyaṃ |
analyzed: sahe ca buddhakṣetre mama varṇam bhāṣayeyuḥ tatra ca sattvānām praṇidhānam udyojayeyam

original: te ca sattvā mama varṇaṃ śrutvā mamaiva buddhakṣetre praṇidhānaṃ kurvīran,
analyzed: te ca sattvāḥ mama varṇam śrutvā mama eva buddhakṣetre praṇidhānam kurvīran
upapattim ca ākāṅkṣeyuḥ

original: yādyahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ maraṇakālasamaye purataḥ na tiṣṭheyaṃ dharmaṃ na deśayeyaṃ cittaṃ na saṃprasādayeyaṃ,
analyzed: yādi aham bhadanta bhagavan teṣām sattvānām maraṇa kāla samaye puratas na tiṣṭheyam dharmam na deśayeyam cittam na saṃprasādayeyam
mā ca aham anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyam

original: yadi me sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā durgatīṣūpapadyeyurna ca mama buddhakṣetre manuṣyapratilābhaṃ labheyuḥ,
analyzed: yadi me sattvāḥ kālam kṛtvā durgatīṣu upapadyeyuḥ na ca mama buddhakṣetre manuṣya pratilābham labheyuḥ

original: sarve mama dharmā saṃmoṣaṃ gaccheyurmā ca me pratibhāyeyurmā cāhaṃ śakyaṃ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ niṣpādayituṃ |
analyzed: sarve mama dharmāḥ saṃmoṣam gaccheyuḥ mā ca me pratibhāyeyuḥ mā ca aham śakyam sakalam buddha kāryam niṣpādayitum

original: ye sattvā nārāyaṇabhaktikā yāvatte sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā durgatiṃ prapateyustanmā cāhaṃ śakyaṃ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ niṣpādayituṃ |
analyzed: ye sattvāḥ nārāyaṇa bhaktikāḥ yāvat te sattvāḥ kālam kṛtvā durgatim prapateyuḥ tat mā ca aham śakyam sakalam buddha kāryam niṣpādayitum

original: bodhiprāptasya ca me sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā ānantaryakārakā yāvat kumārge vihanyamānā mahāsaṅkaṭaprāptāḥ sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra
analyzed: bodhi prāptasya ca me sarva buddhakṣetreṣu sattvāḥ ānantarya kārakāḥ yāvat ku mārge vihanyamānāḥ mahā saṅkaṭa prāptāḥ sattvāḥ kālam kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra

original: idaṃ teṣāṃ nimittaṃ pāṃśuvarṇāste sattvā bhaviṣyanti,
analyzed: idam teṣām nimittam pāṃśu varṇāḥ te sattvāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: piśācamukhī muṣṭasmṛtayo durgandhā duḥśīlā alpāyuṣkā vividharogopahatā vividhapariṣkāraparihīṇāśca te sattvā bhaviṣyanti;
analyzed: piśācamukhī muṣṭa smṛtayaḥ durgandhāḥ duḥśīlāḥ alpa āyuṣkāḥ vividha roga upahatāḥ vividha pariṣkāra parihīṇāḥ ca te sattvāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: teṣām sattvānāmarthe'haṃ yāvattasmin samaye sahe lokadhātau cāturdvīpikā bhaveyuḥ,
analyzed: teṣām sattvānām artha īham yāvat tasmin samaye sahe lokadhātau cāturdvīpikāḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: sarvatra ca cāturdvīpikāyāṃ saṃtuṣitabhavanāvataraṇaṃ māturgarbhe cāhaṃ jātumupadarśayeyaṃ,
analyzed: sarvatra ca cāturdvīpikāyām saṃtuṣita bhavana avataraṇam mātuḥ garbhe ca aham jātum upadarśayeyam
vistareṇa kumāra krīḍā śilpa karmasthāna duṣkara caryā māra dharṣaṇa bodhi abhisaṃbudhyana dharma cakra pravartanam
sarvatra ca cāturdvīpikāsu sakalam buddha kāryam upadarśayeyam
parinirvāṇam yāvat śarīra vibhāgam upadarśayeyam
bodhi prāptaḥ ca aham eka pada vyāhareṇa dharmam deśayeyam

original: ye sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikāste śrāvakayānakathāpiṭakaṃ dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
analyzed: ye sattvāḥ śrāvaka yānikāḥ te śrāvaka yāna kathā piṭakam dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ

original: ye sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhavaineyāste pratyekabuddhayānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyurye sattvā anuttaramahāyānikāste'nuttaramahāyānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ |
analyzed: ye sattvāḥ pratyekabuddha vaineyāḥ te pratyekabuddha yāna kathā dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ ye sattvāḥ anuttara mahāyānikāḥ tena uttara mahāyāna kathā dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ

original: ye sattvāḥ saṃbhāravirahitāste dānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyurye sattvāḥ puṇyavirahitāḥ sukhasvargābhilāṣināste śīlakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
analyzed: ye sattvāḥ saṃbhāra virahitāḥ te dāna kathā dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ ye sattvāḥ puṇya virahitāḥ sukha svarga abhilāṣināḥ te śīla kathā dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ
ye paraspara bhīta kaluṣa cittāḥ praduṣṭa cittāḥ te maitryā avyāhāra kathā dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ
prāṇa atipātikāḥ karuṇā dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ
ye īrṣyā mātsarya abhibhūtāḥ te muditā vyāhāra kathā dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ
ye rūpa ārūpya mada matta cittāḥ te upekṣā vyāhāra kathā dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ
ye kāma rāga mada matta cittāḥ aśubha vyāhāreṇa dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ

original: ye ca sattvā mahāyānikauddhatyavyākulacittopagatāste ānāpānasmṛtivyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
analyzed: ye ca sattvāḥ mahāyānika auddhatya vyākula citta upagatāḥ te āna apāna smṛti vyāhāreṇa dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ

original: ye duḥprajñā vā pradīpapratītyasamutpādavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
analyzed: ye duḥprajñāḥ vā pradīpa pratītyasamutpāda vyāhāreṇa dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ
ye ilpa śruta vādinaḥ te saṃpramoṣa śruta dhāraṇī vipraṇāśa vyāhāreṇa dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ
kudṛṣṭi saṅkaṭa prāptāḥ śūnyatā vyāhāreṇa dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ

original: vitarkasamudācāropahatā animittavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitāmājānīyurapraṇihitāpariśuddhopahatā apraṇihitavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
analyzed: vitarka samudācāra upahatāḥ animitta vyāhāreṇa dharmam deśitām ājānīyuḥ apraṇihita apariśuddha upahatāḥ apraṇihita vyāhāreṇa dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ
āśaya a pariśūddhāḥ pariśuddha āśaya vyāhāreṇa dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ
vyavakīrṇa samudācāra upahatāḥ bodhi citta a saṃpramoṣa vyāhāreṇa dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ
kṣama prayoga ūṣma upahatāḥ akṛtrima vyāhāreṇa dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ
adhyāśaya praśrabdha upahatāḥ a niśrita vyāhāreṇa dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ
kliṣṭa cittāḥ peyālam kalpa citta vyāhāreṇa
kuśala saṃpramoṣa cittā vairocana vyāhāreṇa
māra karma udyuktāḥ śūnyatā vyāhāreṇa
para vadhe saṃpratipannāḥ abhyudgata vyāhāreṇa
vividha kleśa upahata cittāḥ vigata vyāhāreṇa
viṣama mārga saṃpratipannāḥ āvarta vyāhāreṇa
mahāyāna kautuhala cittā vivarta vyāhāreṇa
saṃsāra udvignānām bodhisattvānām rati vyāhāreṇa
kuśala bhūmi jñāna avagatāḥ amūḍha vyāhāreṇa
paraspara asaṃtuṣṭa kuśala mūlānām śruta vyāhāreṇa
paraspara asama cittānām apratihata raśmi vyāhāreṇa
viṣama karma saṃpratipannānām kriyā avatāraṇa vyāhāreṇa
parṣad bhaya upagatānām siṃhaketu vyāhāreṇa
catur māra abhibhūta cittānām śūra vyāhāreṇa
buddhakṣetra anavabhāsa gatānām sattvānām prabhā vyūha vyāhāreṇa
anunaya pratighānām śaila uccaya vyāhāreṇa
buddha dharma ālokana abhibhūtānām dhvaja agra keyūra vyāhāreṇa
mahā prajñā virahitānām ulkā pāta vyāhāreṇa
moha andhakāra gatānām bhāskara pradīpa vyāhāreṇa
kṣaya anirukti prayuktānām guṇa ākara vyāhāreṇa
phena piṇḍa upama ātma abhikāṅkṣiṇām nārāyaṇa vyāhāreṇa
cala acala buddhīnām sāra anugata vyāhāreṇa
avalokita mūrdhānām merudhvaja vyāhāreṇa
pūrva pratijñā utsṛṣṭānām sāravatī vyāhāreṇa
cyuta abhijñānām vajra pada vyāhāreṇa
bodhimaṇḍa abhikāṅkṣiṇām vajramaṇḍa vyāhāreṇa
sarva dharma jugupsitānām vajra upama vyāhāreṇa
sattva caritam a prajānatām cāritravati vyāhāreṇa
indriya para apara anabhijñānām prajñā pradīpa vyāhāreṇa
paraspara rutam a prajānatām ruta praveśa vyāhāreṇa
dharmakāyam a pratilabdhānām saddharmakāya vibhāvana vyāhāreṇa
tathāgata darśana virahitānām animiṣa vyāhāreṇa
sarva ālaṃbana vigopitānām araṇya vyāhāreṇa
dharmacakra pravartana abhikāṅkṣiṇām cakra vimala vyāhāreṇa
ahetu vidyā saṃprasthitānām vidyā pratītya anuloma vyāhāreṇa
eka buddhakṣetra śāśvata dṛṣṭīnām sukṛta vicaya vyāhāreṇa
lakṣaṇa anuvyañjana anavarupta bījānām alaṅkāravatī vyāhāreṇa
vācā ruta prabheda asamarthānām nirhāravati vyāhāreṇa
sarvajña jñāna abhikāṅkṣiṇām dharmadhātu avikopana vyāhāreṇa
pratyutpanna āvartana dharmāṇām dṛḍha vyāhāreṇa
dharmadhātum a prajānatām abhijñā vyāhāreṇa
prajñā utsṛṣṭānām acyuta vyāhāreṇa
mārga vigopitānām avikāra vyāhāreṇa
ākāśa sama jñāna abhikāṅkṣiṇām niṣkiñcana vyāhāreṇa
pāramitā paripūrṇānām pariśuddha pratiṣṭhā vyāhāreṇa
a paripūrṇa a saṃgraha vastūnām su saṃgṛhīta vyāhāreṇa
brahmavihāra vimārgitānām sama prayoga vyāhāreṇa
bodhi pakṣa ratna aparipūrṇānām avyavasthita niryāṇa vyāhāreṇa
su bhāṣita jñānām pramuṣṭa cittānām sāgara mudrā vyāhāreṇa
anutpattika dharma kṣānti kautūhala cittānām niścita vyāhāreṇa
yathā śruta dharma pramuṣṭa cittānām a saṃpramoṣa vyāhāreṇa
paraspara subhāṣita asaṃtuṣṭānām vitimira vyāhāreṇa
triratna a pratilabdha prasādānām puṇya utsada vyāhāreṇa
dharma mukha pravarṣaṇa asaṃtuṣṭānām dharma megha vyāhāreṇa
triratna uccheda dṛṣṭīnām ratnavyūha vyāhāreṇa
jñāna ardita karma abhiyuktānām anupama vyāhāreṇa
sarva saṃyojana bandhana gatānām gagana mukha vyāhāreṇa
sarva dharma ananya cittānām jñānamudrā vyāhāreṇa
tathāgata guṇa a paripūrṇānām loka vidyā saṃmukhībhāva vyāhāreṇa
viniścita prātihārya vyāhāreṇa
eka dharma mukha aparāntaka kalpa anirdiṣṭānām sarva dharma naya vyāhāreṇa
sarva sutrānta aviniścitānām dharma svabhāva samatā viniścita vyāhāreṇa
ṣaṣ pārāyaṇīya dharma parivarjitānām sarva dharma naya vyāhāreṇa
vimokṣa citta āśaya anabhiyuktānām vikriḍita abhijñā vyāhāreṇa
tathāgata guhya anupraveśa vimarśitānām apara praṇeya vyāhāreṇa
bodhisattva caryā an abhiyuktānām jñāna āgama vyāhāreṇa
jñāti kāma saṃdarśikānām sarvatra anugata vyāhāreṇa
sa avaśeṣa bodhisattva cārikānām abhiṣeka vyāhāreṇa
daśa tathāgata bala a paripūrṇānām anavamarda vyāhāreṇa
catur vaiśāradya a pratilabdhānām a paryādīnava vyāhāreṇa
āveṇika buddha dharma a pratilabdhānām asaṃhārya vyāhāreṇa
amogha śravaṇa darśanānām praṇidhāna vyāhāreṇa
sarva buddha dharma saṃmukha anubodhāya śrota āvilānām vimala samudra vyāhāreṇa
sa avaśeṣa sarvajña jñānānām su vibuddha vyāhāreṇa
aprāpta sarva tathāgata kārya abhiprāyānām aparyanta niṣṭhā vyāhāreṇa dharmam deśitam ājānīyuḥ iti

original: ye bodhisattvā aśaṭhā amāyāvino ṛjukā ṛjuka jātīyāśca teṣāṃ caturaśītidharmamukhasahasrāṇi caturaśītisamādhimukhasahasrāṇi pañcasaptatidhāraṇīmukhasahasrāṇi aprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ ekapadavyāhāreṇa ime guṇāḥ santāne pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ;
analyzed: ye bodhisattvāḥ a śaṭhāḥ a māyāvinaḥ ṛjukāḥ ṛjuka jātīyāḥ ca teṣām caturaśīti dharma mukha sahasrāṇi caturaśīti samādhi mukha sahasrāṇi pañca saptati dhāraṇī mukha sahasrāṇi aprameya asaṃkhyeyānām mahāyāna saṃprasthitānām eka pada vyāhāreṇa ime guṇāḥ santāne pratiṣṭhāpayeyam
yena bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ mahā saṃnāha saṃnaddhāḥ bhaveyuḥ
acintya praṇidhāna viśeṣa abhyudgatāḥ bhaveyuḥ acintya jñāna darśana bodhisat guṇa alaṅkṛtāḥ bhaveyuḥ
tat yathā kāya alaṅkṛtāḥ lakṣaṇa anuvyañjanaiḥ
vāc alaṅkṛtāḥ bhaveyuḥ yathā abhiprāyāḥ
sattvāḥ su bhāṣitena saṃtoṣayeyuḥ
śruta alaṅkṛtāḥ samādhya vacana tayā
smṛtyā alaṅkṛtāḥ dhāraṇya saṃpramoṣa tayā
manaḥ ulaṅkṛtāḥ nirvṛtyā alaṅkṛtāḥ ku gati avabudhyana tayā
āśayā alaṅkṛtāḥ dṛḍha pratijñātayā
prayoga alaṅkṛtāḥ pratijñā uttāraṇa tayā
adhyāśaya alaṅkṛtāḥ bhūmyāḥ bhūmi saṃkramaṇa tayā
dāna alaṅkṛtāḥ sarva vastu parityāga tayā
śīla alaṅkṛtāḥ su śruta āvita vimala tayā
kṣānti alaṅkṛtāḥ sarva sattva apratihata citta tayā
vīrya alaṅkṛtāḥ sarva saṃbhāra upacita tayā
dhyāna alaṅkṛtāḥ sarva samāpatti vikrīḍita abhijñāḥ bhaveyuḥ
prajñā alaṅkṛtāḥ kleśa vāsana parijñāvinaḥ
maitryā alaṅkṛtāḥ sarva sattvasya trāya anugatāḥ
karuṇā alaṅkṛtāḥ sarva sattva a parityāga sthitā
mudita alaṅkṛtāḥ sarva dharma akathaṃkathā prāptā
upekṣā alaṅkṛtāḥ unnāma avanāma dvaya vigatāḥ
abhijñā alaṅkṛtāḥ sarva vikrīḍita abhijñāḥ
puṇya alaṅkṛtā akṣaya bhoga ratna pāṇi tā pratilabdhā
jñāna alaṅkṛtāḥ sarva sattva citta carita abhijñā
buddhyā alaṅkṛtāḥ sarva sattva kauśalya dharma vibodhayitāraḥ
āloka alaṅkṛtāḥ prajñācakṣuḥ ālokam pratilabheyuḥ
pratisaṃvid alaṅkṛtāḥ artha dharma nirukti pratibhāna pratisaṃvid pratilabdhāḥ bhaveyuḥ vaiśāradya alaṅkṛtāḥ sarva māra para pravādin abhibhūtā
guṇa alaṅkṛtā buddhānām guṇa anuprāptā
dharma alaṅkṛtāḥ satata samitam asaṅga pratibhānena sattvānām dharmam deśayeyuḥ
āloka alaṅkṛtāḥ sarva buddha dharma avabhāsa gatāḥ
prabhā alaṅkṛtāḥ sarva buddhakṣetra avabhāsa gatā
ādarśana prātihārya alaṅkṛtā akṣuṇa vyākaraṇā
anuśāsanī prātihārya alaṅkṛtā yathāvat anuśāsanī pradāyakā
ṛddhi prātihārya alaṅkṛtāḥ catur ṛddhipāda parama pāramitā prāptāḥ
sarva tathāgata adhiṣṭhāna alaṅkṛtāḥ tathāgata guhya anupraviṣṭā
dharma aiśvarya alaṅkṛtāḥ apara adhīna jñāna pratilabdhāḥ
sarva kuśala dharma pratipatti sāra alaṅkṛtāḥ yathāvādi tathākāri sarvatas nava marditāḥ bhaveyuḥ iti

original: apramāṇāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ sattvānāmekapadavyāhāreṇāhaṃ mahatā kuśalaviśodhanasaṃnicayena saṃtarpayeyaṃ |
analyzed: apramāṇa asaṃkhyeyānām mahāyāna saṃprasthitānām sattvānām eka pada vyāhāreṇa aham mahatā kuśala viśodhana saṃnicayena saṃtarpayeyam
tatas te bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ sarva dharmeṣu apara pratyaya jñānam pratilabheyuḥ
mahatā ca dharma avabhāsena samanvāgatāḥ bhaveyuḥ
kṣipram ca anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyuḥ iti

original: ye'pi te bhadanta bhagavan sattvā bhaveyuranyeṣu lokadhātuṣvānantaryakārakā yāvanmūlāpattisāparādhikā dagdhasantānāḥ śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā anuttaramahāyānikā vā praṇidhānavaśena mama buddhakṣetre pratyājāyeyuḥ |
analyzed: ye api te bhadanta bhagavan sattvāḥ bhaveyuḥ anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ānantarya kārakāḥ yāvat mūla āpatti sa aparādhikāḥ dagdha santānāḥ śrāvaka yānikāḥ vā pratyekabuddha yānikāḥ vā anuttara mahā yānikāḥ vā praṇidhāna vaśena mama buddhakṣetre pratyājāyeyuḥ

original: akuśalamūlasamavadhānā rukṣāḥ pāpecchāḥ krūrakhaṭuṅkasantānā viparītabuddhaya āgṛhītasantānāḥ teṣāṃ cāhaṃ caturaśītiścittarutasahasrāṃ deśayeyuḥ,
analyzed: akuśala mūla samavadhānāḥ rukṣāḥ pāpa icchāḥ krūra khaṭuṅka santānāḥ viparīta buddhayaḥ āgṛhīta santānāḥ teṣām ca aham caturaśītiḥ citta ruta sahasrām deśayeyuḥ

original: yāvat kuśīdacittānāṃ sattvānāmahaṃ caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi vistareṇa deśayeyaṃ |
analyzed: yāvat kuśīdacittānām sattvānām aham caturaśīti dharma skandha sahasrāṇi vistareṇa deśayeyam

original: ye ca tatra sattvā anuttaramahāyānikā bhaveyuḥ teṣāṃ cāhaṃ vistareṇa ṣaṭpāramitādharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
analyzed: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ anuttara mahāyānikāḥ bhaveyuḥ teṣām ca aham vistareṇa ṣaṣ pāramitā dharmam deśayeyam

original: dānapāramitāṃ vistareṇa deśayeyaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāṃ vistareṇa deśayeyaṃ |
analyzed: dāna pāramitām vistareṇa deśayeyam yāvat prajñāpāramitām vistareṇa deśayeyam

original: ye ca punastatra sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā bhaveyuḥ,
analyzed: ye ca punar tatra sattvāḥ śrāvaka yānikāḥ vā pratyekabuddha yānikāḥ vā bhaveyuḥ
an avarupta kuśala mūlāḥ bhaveyuḥ
śāstāra abhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ
tān ca aham triśaraṇa gamanena vyavasthāpayeyam
paścāt pāramitāsu niyojayeyam
vihiṃsā ratānām prāna atipāta vaira maṇyām vyavasthāpayeyam
viṣama lobha abhibhūtānām adatta ādāna vairamaṇyām vyavasthāpayeyam
adharma rāga raktām kāma mithyā ācāra vaira maṇyām vyavasthāpayeyam
paraspara paruṣa vacana bhāṣiṇaḥ mṛṣāvāda vairamaṇyām vyavasthāpayeyam
unmatta abhiratān surā maireya madya pramāda vaira maṇyām vyavasthāpayeyam

original: yeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ sarvapañcadoṣā bhaveyustāṃ pañcadoṣavairamaṇyopāsakasaṃvare vyavasthāpayeyaṃ |
analyzed: yeṣām ca sattvānām sarva pañca doṣāḥ bhaveyuḥ tām pañca doṣa vaira maṇya upāsaka saṃvare vyavasthāpayeyam

original: ye sattvā anabhiratāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tāṃścāhaṃ rātriṃdivasamaṣṭāṅge śīle pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ |
analyzed: ye sattvāḥ an abhiratāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tān ca aham rātriṃdivasam aṣṭa aṅge śīle pratiṣṭhāpayeyam
ye sattvāḥ parītta kuśala mūla abhirata cittāḥ tān ca api aham su ākhyāte dharma vinaye upaśleṣayeyam
pravrajyā saṃvare daśa śikṣā pade brahmacarye sthāpayeyam

original: ye sattvāḥ kuśalān dharmān paryeṣṭukāmāstānapyahaṃ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu samādāpya sakale brahmacaryavāse pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ |
analyzed: ye sattvāḥ kuśalān dharmān paryeṣṭu kāmāḥ tān api aham kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu samādāpya sakale brahmacarya vāse pratiṣṭhāpayeyam

original: evaṃrūpānāmānantaryakārakānāṃ yāvad āgṛhītasantānānāṃ sattvānāmarthe cāhaṃ bahuvividhanānārthapadavyañjanaprātihāryairdharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
analyzed: evaṃrūpānām ānantarya kārakānām yāvat āgṛhīta santānānām sattvānām arthe ca aham bahu vividha nānā artha pada vyañjana prātihāryaiḥ dharmam deśayeyam
anitya duḥkha anātma śūnya skandha dhātu āyatanāni darśayeyam

original: kuśale kṣeme śive śānte'bhayapure nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ |
analyzed: kuśale kṣeme śive śānta ibhaya pure nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayeyam

original: evamahaṃ caturṇāṃ parṣadāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ;
analyzed: evam aham caturṇām parṣadām bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī upāsaka upāsikānām dharmam deśayeyam

original: ye ca vādārthino bhaveyusteṣāṃ ahaṃ dharmavādaśāstraṃ prakāśayeyaṃ;
analyzed: ye ca vāda arthinaḥ bhaveyuḥ teṣām aham dharma vāda śāstram prakāśayeyam

original: ye ca nābhiratāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu teṣāṃ cāhaṃ vaiyāvṛtyakarmāṇi nirdiśeyam,
analyzed: ye ca na abhiratāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu teṣām ca aham vaiyāvṛtya karmāṇi nirdiśeyam
svādhyāya abhiratānām eka aṃśena śūnyatām dhyāna vimukti gāminām nirdeśayeyam
ekaikasya sattvasya arthāya aham bahu yojana śata sahasrāṇi pradbhyām gaccheyam
bahu vividha nānā prakāra artha pada vyañjana upāya prātihāryaiḥ akhedam utsaheyam
yāvat nirvāṇe sthāpayeyam
yāvat samādhāna balena aham pañcama bhāgam āyuḥ saṃskārāṇām avasṛjeyam
parinirvāṇa kāla samaye ca aham svayam eva sva śarīra sarṣapa phala pramāṇa mātram bhindeyam
sattvānām kāruṇya arthe ca aham paścāt parinirvāpayeyam
parinirvṛtasya ca me varṣa sahasram saddharmaḥ tiṣṭhet
pañca punar varṣa śatāni saddharma pratirūpakaḥ tiṣṭhet

original: ye ca sattvā mama parinirvṛtasya śarīreṣu pūjautsukyamāpadyeyū ratnairyāvadvādyairantaśa ekabuddhanāmaikavandanā ekapradakṣinīkaraṇena ekāñjalikarmaṇā ekapuṣpeṇa pūjāṃ kurvīran,
analyzed: ye ca sattvāḥ mama parinirvṛtasya śarīreṣu pūjā autsukyam āpadyeyuḥ ratnaiḥ yāvat vādyaiḥ antaśas eka buddha nāma eka vandanāḥ eka pradakṣinīkaraṇena eka añjali karmaṇā eka puṣpeṇa pūjām kurvīran
sarve bhaveyuḥ yathā abhiprāyāḥ tribhiḥ yānaiḥ

original: ye ca sattvā mama parinirvṛtasya śāsane'ntaśa ekaśikṣāpadamapi gṛhṇīyuryathoktaṃ samādāya varteyuryāvaccatuṣpadagāthāṃ paryavāpnuyurvācayeyuḥ,
analyzed: ye ca sattvāḥ mama parinirvṛtasya śāsanā intaśas eka śikṣā padam api gṛhṇīyuḥ yathā uktam samādāya varteyuḥ yāvat catuṣpada gāthām paryavāpnuyuḥ vācayeyuḥ
pareṣām ca deśayeyuḥ

original: ye'pi śṛṇuyuścittaṃ vā prasādayeyurdharmabhāṇakasya vā pūjāṃ kuryurantaśa ekapuṣpeṇāpi ekavandanenāpi,
analyzed: ye api śṛṇuyuḥ cittam vā prasādayeyuḥ dharma bhāṇakasya vā pūjām kuryuḥ antaśas eka puṣpeṇa api eka vandanena api
sarve bhaveyuḥ tribhiḥ yānaiḥ yathā abhiprāyā

original: yāvat saddharme'ntarhite saddharmolkāyāṃ nirvāpitāyāṃ dharmadhvaje patite te ca mama janmaśarīramavatareyuryāvat kāñcanacakre tiṣṭheyuryasmin kāle sahe buddhakṣetre ratnadurbhikṣaṃ bhavet tasmin samaye ketumatirnāma maṇivaiḍuryamayaṃ agninirbhāsaṃ tiṣṭhet |
analyzed: yāvat saddharme antarhite saddharma ulkāyām nirvāpitāyām dharma dhvaje patite te ca mama janma śarīram avatareyuḥ yāvat kāñcana cakre tiṣṭheyuḥ yasmin kāle sahe buddhakṣetre ratna durbhikṣam bhavet tasmin samaye ketumatiḥ nāma maṇi vaiḍurya mayam agni nirbhāsam tiṣṭhet

original: tacca tato'bhyudgamyorddhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavane sthitvā vividhāṃ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ pravarṣet,
analyzed: tat ca tatas abhyudgamya ūrddhvam yāvat akaniṣṭha bhavane sthitvā vividhām puṣpa vṛṣṭim pravarṣet

māndārava mahāmāndārava pārijātaka mañjuṣaka mahāmañjuṣaka roca mahārocamāna pūrṇā candra vimalā śatapatra sahasrapatra śatasahasrapatra samantaprabhā samantagandhā surucira sadāphalā hṛdayanayanā abhiramyā jyotiprabhā jyotirasā anantavarṇā anantagandhā anantaprabhānām evaṃrūpānām puṣpa varṣam abhipravarṣet

original: tataśca puṣpavarṣādvividhā śabdā niścareyustadyathā buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabda upāsakasaṃvaraśabda āryāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatopoṣadhopavāsaśabdo daśapravrajyāśikṣāpadasaṃvaraśabdo dānaśabdaḥ śīlaśabdaḥ sakalabrahmacaryaparipūrṇopasaṃpadāśabdo vaiyāvṛttiśabdo'dhyayanaśabdaḥ pratisaṃlayanaśabdaḥ yoniśomanasikāraśabdo'śubhaśabdo ānāpānasmṛtiśabdo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaśabda ākiñcanyāyatanaśabdo vijñānānantyāyatanaśabda ākāśānantyāyatanaśabdo'bhibhavāyatanaśabdaḥ kṛtsnāyatanaśabdaḥ śamathavipaśyanāśabdaḥ śūnyatāpraṇihitaśabdo'nimittaśabdaḥ pratītyasamutpādaśabdaḥ sakalaśrāvakapiṭakaśabdaśca niścaret,
analyzed: tatas ca puṣpa varṣāt vividhā śabdāḥ niścareyuḥ tat yathā buddha śabdaḥ dharma śabdaḥ saṅgha śabdaḥ upāsaka saṃvara śabdaḥ ārya aṣṭāṅga samanvāgata upoṣadha upavāsa śabdaḥ daśa pravrajyā śikṣā pada saṃvara śabdaḥ dāna śabdaḥ śīla śabdaḥ sakala brahmacarya paripūrṇa upasaṃpadā śabdaḥ vaiyāvṛtti śabda adhyayana śabdaḥ pratisaṃlayana śabdaḥ yoni śomanasikāra śabda ūśubha śabdaḥ āna apāna smṛti śabdaḥ na eva s
sakala pratyekabuddha yānapiṭaka śabdaḥ niścaret
sakala mahāyāna kathā ṣaṣ pāramitā śabdaḥ te puṣpāḥ avakireyuḥ

original: sarve ca rūpāvacarā devāḥ śṛṇuyuḥ svakasvakāni pūrvakṛtāni kuśalamūlānyanusmareyuḥ,
analyzed: sarve ca rūpāvacarāḥ devāḥ śṛṇuyuḥ svaka svakāni pūrva kṛtāni kuśala mūlāni anusmareyuḥ

original: sarvakuśaleṣu dharmeṣu mahāsattvā ajugupsanīyāste tato'vatareyuḥ sarve sahe lokadhātau manuṣyāṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu niyojayeyuḥ pratiṣṭhāpayeyuḥ
analyzed: sarva kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu mahāsattvāḥ a jugupsanīyāḥ te tatas avatareyuḥ sarve sahe lokadhātau manuṣyām daśa kuśaleṣu karma patheṣu niyojayeyuḥ pratiṣṭhāpayeyuḥ

original: evameva sarve kāmāvacarā devāḥ śṛṇuyusteṣāṃ ca tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanaratikrīḍāsaumanasyābhiratāṃścittacaitasikāṃ sarvān praśrambhayeyuḥ,
analyzed: evam eva sarve kāmāvacarāḥ devāḥ śṛṇuyuḥ teṣām ca tṛṣṇā saṃyojana rati krīḍā saumanasya abhiratān citta caitasikām sarvān praśrambhayeyuḥ
te sarve svakāni pūrva kṛtāni kuśala mūlāni anusmareyuḥ
